SEARCH
Package main.models

Class Coin

java.lang.Object
main.models.Coin
Direct Known Subclasses:
Transaction
public class Coin extends Object
The Coin class represents a coin object in a cryptocurrency system. Each coin has an address and an amount, and can have one or more input coins.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Coin (String address, long amount)
    Constructs a Coin object with the given address and amount.
    Coin (String address, long amount, List<Coin> inputs)
    Constructs a Coin object with the given address, amount, and list of input coins.

  • Constructor Details

    • Coin

      public Coin (String address, long amount)
      Constructs a Coin object with the given address and amount. Used to generate a coin from coinbase transaction
      Parameters:
      address - The address of the coin.
      amount - The amount of the coin.

    • Coin

      public Coin (String address, long amount, List<Coin> inputs)
      Constructs a Coin object with the given address, amount, and list of input coins. Used to generate coins from input coins
      Parameters:
      address - The address of the coin.
      amount - The amount of the coin.
      inputs - The list of input coins.
